doc.title: Saitunan duniya
doc.excludeDomains: Ƙara sunayen yanki don cirewa Sunan yanki ɗaya kaɗai za a iya ƙarawa a lokaci guda.

example.domain: Kuna iya ƙara sunan yanki, kamar {{url}}, don keɓe sunan yankin gaba ɗaya.
example.url: Kuna iya keɓance takamaiman hanyoyin haɗin gwiwa ta ƙara hanyar haɗin gwiwa, kamar {{url}}.
example.glob: Kuna iya ƙara ƙirar {{glob}}, kamar {{minimatch}}, don daidaitawa.

doc.script: Hakanan zaka iya amfani da rubutun js don cimma ingantaccen sarrafawa.
doc.checkedUseScript: Ko don kunna rubutun ku, lura cewa kuna buƙatar duba akwatunan biyu a lokaci guda don kunna rubutun.

example1.commentTitle: A halin yanzu akan gidan yanar gizon {{youtube}}, kuna buƙatar buɗe shafin {{watch}} ko {{gajeren}} na {{youtube}} a cikin sabon shafin.
example1.page: Maɓallin shine URL ɗin shafin yanar gizon yanzu Don cikakkun bayanai, Da fatan za a duba
example1.pageHost: : Sunan yanki na shafin yanar gizon yanzu
example1.isSameSubDomain: {{isSameSubDomain}}: Sunan yanki iri ɗaya Lura cewa duk da cewa manyan sunayen yanki na {{youtube}} da {{families}} duka biyun {{mainDomain}} ne, sunayen yankin suna {{youtubeSubDomain}} da {{ familySubDomain}} don haka sunayen yankinsu ya bambanta.
example1.clickpath: : Hanyar hanyar haɗin da aka danna
example1.minimatch: : {{glob}} Hanyar dacewa, ta amfani da {{minimatch}} laburare, hanyar amfani Don Allah Duba, ko kuma za ku iya nemo yadda ake amfani da {{glob}}.
example1.rightTab: : Haɗin yana buɗewa a cikin sabon shafin a dama
example1.wholeCode: Ma'anar gaba dayan lambar ita ce, a halin yanzu a shafin yanar gizon {{www}} na YouTube, idan mahaɗin da aka latsa shine sunan yankin guda ɗaya kuma hanyar ta fara da {{watch}} ko {{gajeren}}, sai sabon shafin. shafi na dama zai bude.
